meanings.sent1: I need to reremind myself to take out the trash before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: Can you reremind me to call grandma later?
meanings.sent3: The sticky note on the fridge rereminded me to buy milk.
meanings.sent4: Her smile rereminded me of sunny days at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock rereminded me of the important meeting.

meanings.sent1: Please reremind me to water the plants tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The teacher rereminded the students about the upcoming test.
meanings.sent3: The old photograph rereminded him of his childhood adventures.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fresh cookies rereminded her of baking with her mom.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the train rereminded him of his daily commute.
